attributes.action: New starter furlough: Support workers who started their job after 28/02/2020
attributes.additional_details:
The recent announcement and clarification of the government grants to help support furloughing workers who otherwise would have been laid off as a result of the pandemic has a major oversight in new workers joining the payroll.
 
This is a huge oversight and puts thousands of workers at risk, and stuck in the place of having no income and little to no prospect of getting employment in this current economy.

Those who have recently started work are at more of a risk and require support.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to support workers financially who have started their jobs after the stated date of 28/02/2020.
